```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(aphid)
library(Biostrings)
library(taxreturn)
library(ape)
library(DECIPHER)
library(seqinr)
```

```{r}
seqs_CO1 <-
readDNAStringSet("data/Database_Sequences/unique_resolved_Amphibian_Reference_Sequences_COI.fasta") 
```

```{r}
dereplicated_seqs_CO1 <-
tibble(sequences = paste(seqs_CO1), 
         names = names(seqs_CO1)) %>%
  mutate(names = str_replace(names, ".*;", "")) %>%
  distinct() 

write.fasta(as.list(dereplicated_seqs_CO1$sequences), 
                    dereplicated_seqs_CO1$names, 
            file.out = 'data/Database_Sequences/dereplicated_seqs_CO1.fasta')

dereplicated_seqs_CO1 <-
readDNAStringSet('data/Database_Sequences/dereplicated_seqs_CO1.fasta')
```
